input.sentences: it is organization organization 's day and everyone is excited about the parade .
the mascot walks down the street leading the parade .
a group of young band members play their instruments .
the sides of the street are crowded .
small souvenirs are sold along the road .
output.sentences: I went to a Parade on Main street.
Everyone was dressed up to celebrate st. patricks day.
There was a really fun marching band full of kids.
The street was full of happy people.
I got myself a little green frog as a suvenir.
